def.dt: :a particular goal or aim :something that a person hopes to do or achieve My first ambition as a child was to be in the circus. The wife of a famous poet, she had literary ambitions of her own. [=she wanted to be a writer too] He has ambitions for an acting career. = He has ambitions to become an actor. = His ambition is to be/become an actor. She finally achieved/realized/fulfilled her life's ambition [=the thing she most wanted to do in her life] when she started her own business.

:a desire to be successful, powerful, or famous He lacked ambition and couldn't compete with the others. With her talent and fierce ambition [=her very strong desire to succeed], she became a very successful actress.
:a desire to do things and be active usually used in negative constructions I was tired and had no ambition [=initiative, energy], so I just spent the whole weekend watching TV.
